languages.text: "Вижу, вы не вняли моим предостережениям и решили явиться сюда, Ваша Светлость. У этого поступка могут быть последствия. Впрочем, у нас с вами все еще есть шанс обернуть его к всеобщей пользе, если Ваша Светлость будет внимательно слушать меня".

"I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."
languages.original_text: "Вижу, вы не вняли моим предостережениям и решили явиться сюда, Ваша Светлость. У этого поступка могут быть последствия. Впрочем, у нас с вами все еще есть шанс обернуть его к всеобщей пользе, если Ваша Светлость будет внимательно слушать меня".

traits.locale_text: "I see that you did not heed my warnings and came here anyway, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This action might have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it around for everyone's benefit, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would listen to me carefully."

"I see that you did not heed my warnings and came here anyway, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This action might have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it around for everyone's benefit, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would listen to me carefully."

"I gather you didn't heed my warnings and came here anyway, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This action might have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it around for everyone's benefit, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would listen to me carefully."

"I gather you didn't heed my warnings and came here anyway, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This action might have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it around for everyone's benefit, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would listen to me carefully."

"I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."

"I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."

languages.text: « Je vois que vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} malgré mes mises en garde, Votre Seigneurie. Cette décision risque d'avoir des conséquences regrettables. Cela dit, chacun peut encore y trouver son avantage, si vous daignez m'écouter attentivement. »
languages.original_text: "I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} ici malgré mes mises en garde, Votre Seigneurie. Cette décision risque d'avoir des conséquences. Cela dit, chacun peut encore y trouver son avantage, si vous daignez m'écouter attentivement. »

languages.text: «Veo que ha ignorado mis advertencias, {name}. Su decisión de acudir aquí a pesar de ellas puede tener consecuencias, pero aún es posible que esto nos beneficie a todos. Escúcheme con toda su atención, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que ha ignorado mis advertencias y ha acudido aquí igualmente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Puede que eso tenga consecuencias, pero aún tenemos una oportunidad de cambiar las cosas en beneficio de todos, si mi{mf|lord|lady} me concede su atención».

languages.text: “看得出来，你并没有听从我的警告，{name}。你依然来到了这里，完全不在乎这么做可能招致的后果。不过，如果你愿意仔细听听我说的话，大人，或许我们依然有机会扭转局面，实现所有人期望的结果。”
languages.original_text: "I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."

traits.locale_text: “看来你并没有听从我的警告，大人。你还是来到了这里，这样的行为可能会招致后果。不过，如果你愿意仔细听听我说的话，或许我们依然有机会扭转局面，实现所有人期望的结果。”

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr meine Warnungen nicht beherzigt, {name}, und seid trotzdem gekommen. Das könnte Folgen haben. Aber noch können wir das so hinbiegen, dass alle profitieren, wenn Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft bereit ist, mir aufmerksam zuzuhören."
languages.original_text: "I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt also nicht auf meine Warnungen gehört und seit doch hergekommen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Diese Entscheidung könnte Konsequenzen haben. Aber noch können wir das so hinbiegen, dass alle profitieren, wenn Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft bereit ist, mir aufmerksam zuzuhören."

languages.text: 「私の警告には従わなかったらしいな、{name}。それにもかかわらずここに来る判断をしたことで、それ相応の結果が伴うかもしれぬ。だが、陛下が私の言うことに注意深く耳を傾けるのなら、皆の利益のためにも、この状況を好転させるチャンスはまだあるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."

traits.locale_text: 「私の警告には従わなかったらしいな、{name}。それにもかかわらずここに来る判断をしたことで、それ相応の結果が伴うかもしれぬ。だが、陛下が私の言うことに注意深く耳を傾けるのなら、皆の利益のためにも、この状況を好転させるチャンスはまだあるだろう」

languages.text: "Uyarılarımı dikkate almamışsın {name}. Hepsine rağmen buraya gelme kararının bir bedeli olacak. Fakat {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri beni dikkatlice dinlerse hâlâ durumu hepimizin lehine çevirebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "I see that you did not heed my warnings, {name}. Your decision to come here in spite of them may have consequences. But we still have a chance to turn it to everyone's advantage, if Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship listens to me very carefully."
